name: Light grooming
description: Does your dog look scruffy? Of course it does – it's a dog! We'll tease out the worst tangles with only a small amount of biting.

name: Wash 'n' brush
description: No matter how much your dog has been rolling around in the mud, we have just the right shampoo to make them smell clean. Mostly.

name: Full clip
description: If you're sick of having dog hair scattered around your house, bring your dog to us and we'll make them look like a movie star. (Only available for pugs who look a bit like Steve Buscemi.)

name: Fancy clip
description: Want to become Instagram famous? Sure you do, and there's no faster way than getting your perfect pooch carefully clipped to look like Chewbacca.
